mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(t.boardNo, #{boardNo}) FROM( SELECT board_no, LAG(board_no) OVER (ORDER BY board_no) AS boardNo FROM board ORDER BY board_no ) t WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
SELECT IFNULL(t.boardNo, #{boardNo}) FROM( SELECT board_no, LEAD(board_no) OVER (ORDER BY board_no) AS boardNo FROM board ORDER BY board_no ) t WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE board_title = #{boardTitle}

SELECT board_no AS boardNo, board_title AS boardTitle, board_content AS boardContent, board_date AS boardDate, member_id AS memberId FROM board WHERE board_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{boardTitle},'%') ORDER BY board_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow} , #{rowPerPage}
SELECT board_no AS boardNo, board_title AS boardTitle, board_content AS boardContent, board_date AS boardDate, member_id AS memberId FROM board WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(member_id, board_title, board_content, board_date) VALUE (#{memberId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_content = #{boardContent} WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
